summary:
This will allow you to play as the fishman lurker from the dragonborn dlc with humanoid animations.

This guy is very large so in small places you are gonna have trouble with the camera and all but it shouldnt be too much of a problem.
You can preform the "Giant's stomp" move when you do a power attack with your fist
descriptionHtml:
This will allow you to play as the fishman lurker from the dragonborn dlc with humanoid animations.

 This guy is very large so in small places you are gonna have trouble with the camera and all but it shouldnt be too much of a problem.
 You can preform the "Giant's stomp" move when you do a power attack with your fist and weapons and when you kill someone or something using a power attack it sends them flying it the air kinda like how giants can do to you but now you can do it! Fun huh.

 Comes with craft-able tentacles which are one handed weapons they only appear while attacking also come with two tentacle spells..
 
 This thing is pretty op but i have made it a little less powerful so you dont one shot everything but that wont be problem if you arent using the non-modded combat system.
 
 Requires - Dragonborn
 Recommended - Customizable Camera by [b]Arindel http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37347/?[/b]
 
 Use a camera mod that can edit the position of the camera in 3rd person if you play in 3rd person so you can get a better view at what you are looking at.

Also I forgot to say you can wear armor and stuff with this but its gonna look really dumb lol
author: Abbalovesyou
